Plot: The whole family is reunited when Sofia comes back for his father's funeral. Quickly, inner problems are revealed.
Title: Rock the Casbah
Writer: Laïla Marrakchi (screenplay), Alexandre Aja (script consultant), Gladys Marciano (script consultant), Raphaëlle Desplechin (script consultant)
Actors: Morjana Alaoui, Nadine Labaki, Hiam Abbass, Lubna Azabal
